articles.title: Speaker Mike Johnson Backtracks on Call for DOJ to Release Epstein Files
articles.description: House Speaker Mike Johnson has reversed his call for the Justice Department to release information about Jeffrey Epstein, a longtime friend of Donald Trump. Johnson stated that President Trump and his administration needed "space" to handle the matter.

articles.title: Trump Admin Releases Over 240K Pages of FBI Records on Martin Luther King Jr.
articles.description: The Trump administration has released over 240,000 pages of FBI records on Martin Luther King Jr. and his assassination, despite opposition from King's children. The King family expressed concern over the historical context of the release.

articles.title: Earth Spinning Faster, AI Companions, World's Most Powerful Passports: Catch Up on the Day's Stories
articles.description: Earth is spinning faster this summer, making days slightly shorter. Additionally, AI companions are becoming more prevalent among teens, and the U.S. is on the verge of dropping out of the top 10 ranking of the world's most powerful passports.
